channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: UK, U.S. working to ensure enduring India-Pakistan ceasefire, dialogue, British foreign minister says
item.description: Britain is working with the U.S. to ensure a ceasefire between India and Pakistan endures, foreign minister David Lammy said.

item.title: Court gives go-ahead to Trump's plan to halt union bargaining for many federal workers
item.description: A federal appeals court lifted an order blocking the Trump administration from stripping federal employees of the ability to unionize over working con...

item.title: Trump recession is off the table — but trouble not over for U.S. economy

Trump says he will call Putin, Zelenskyy, and NATO members on Monday to talk ceasefire, trade
item.description: Trump told reporters on Friday that he would speak with Putin after the Russian president skipped peace talks between Russia and Ukraine in Turkey.

item.title: Trump says nations to get letters detailing tariff rates. Where they stand now.

item.title: Supreme Court rules against Trump administration in Alien Enemies Act case

item.title: U.S. loses final triple-A credit rating after Moody’s downgrade: ‘Not good news’
